client

Class DefaultSocketClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • client.DefaultSocketClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SocketClientConstants, SocketClientInterface, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CarconfigSocket

    public class DefaultSocketClient
extends java.lang.Thread
implements SocketClientInterface, SocketClientConstants
    DefaultSocketClient extends the Thread to providing multi-threading functions for sockets communication
